alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 4:22PM EDT until June 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Holmes, Jackson and Walton. * WHEN...Until 515 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Graceville, Esto, Barker Store, Baker Settlement, Izagora, Leonia, Darlington, Bethlehem, Miller Crossroads, Glendale, Ards Crossroads, Holland Crossroads, Caney Creek, Tendil Crossing and Gordon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
